message.subject: EOL Credit Responses 10/23/00
message.content:
M1.1. Tana:
[Conventional: salutation]
M1.2. No change to profiles for Utilicorp. United Inc. or Calpine Power Services
Company --
[Inform: there are no changes to profiles for Utilicorp or Calpine]
M1.3. these entities are authorized to trade US power.
[Inform: these entities are authorized to trade US power]
Sflink1.3
M1.4. Constellation Energy Source, Inc. is NOT authorized -- restricted by credit.
[Inform: Constellation is not authorized to trade, as it is restricted by credit]

message.subject: EOL Credit Responses 10/23/00
message.content:
M2.1. Just confirming...for Utilicorp. we previously had them open for Enron Sales
only....
[Inform: Tana would like to confirm that Utilicorp was previously open for Enron sales only]
Blink1.3
Sflink2.1

message.subject: EOL Credit Responses 10/23/00
message.content:
M3.1. Tana:
[Conventional: salutation]
M3.2. Thanks for following up --
[Conventional: thanks]
M3.3. Utilicorp. was initially set up for Sales only but
subsequently opened up for Sales and Purchases.
[Inform: Utilicorp originally set up for only Sales but then opened up for Sales and Purchases]
Blink2.1
M3.4. So, they should be open for
US power.
[Inform: Utilicorp should be open for US power]
